Dr.Kavi bharathi did those for me with good care & without any pain and her way of handling patients was amazing. I got my premium zirconia crown,Overall, I highly recommend this place for your dental hygiene..

review: I first visited Partha Dental last year for my root canal treatment and since then it has been my go to place for dental consultation.  Dr. Kavi bharathi is extremely professional and explains everything in a lucid manner. My root canal treatment was pain free. They have a good team of dentists who are professional in examining the root cause and providing the appropriate solution.
